column4: So my fiance just purchased asus' 900 eeepc, just curious if anyone else here has it and whether or not they left the Xandros install, or switched to Ubuntu, and if they used Ubuntu did they use the MID edition? Xubuntu/etc?
the fiance a man or woman?
soundray: She got the 900, her's has 1 GB ram, 20 GB SSD hard drive
